title: Playgroup
text: Playgroups are community-based groups run by parents and whānau volunteers.

links.text: Different types of early learning service

attributes.text: Playgroups are usually free or low-cost.
Playgroups may not operate for longer than three hours a day.
Playgroups are run by parents and whānau volunteers; there are no requirements for teacher qualifications.
To be a playgroup, more than half the children attending must have a parent there with them.
